history.proof: intros x y. scongruence use: mult_oppZ_r, multZ_commutativity unfold: commutativity.

exceptions.tactic: destruct x as [|n|n]; destruct y as [|m|m]; simpl; reflexivity.
exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat Unable to unify "match multpos OZ n with | OZ => OZ | pos n => neg n | neg n => pos n end" with "multneg OZ n".

original: intros x y. unfold multZ, oppZ. destruct x as [|n|n]; destruct y as [|m|m]; simpl; reflexivity.
